fields.title: Allow Universal Imports
fields.name: allow_imports
fields.tooltip: If enabled, all python modules (except os, sys, subprocess) will be allowed to use and if allow_only_safe_builtins set in integrations config.ini then only safe python builtins will be allowed for use in code snippets. To include a specific and restricted set of python libraries recommendation is to use the 'Modules to Import' option below.
